Under normal market conditions, at least 80% of the fund's net assets, plus the amount of any borrowings for investment purposes, will be invested in common stocks and other equity securities of micro-cap and small-cap companies. In addition to common stocks, equity securities may also include preferred stocks, convertible debt securities, and other investment companies and exchange-traded funds ("ETFs") that invest in equity securities of micro-cap and small-cap companies.
